content.name: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
content.summary: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is a 10% Vitamin C serum designed for Oily, Combination skin.

details.usage_instructions: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen

meta_metadata.keywords: Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, Brightening, Fades dark spots
